ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE NUCLEAR SAFETY AND CONTROL ACT which provide for the incorporation of a number of international standards and would correct minor deficiencies or inconsistencies in the Regulations listed hereunder: - General Nuclear Safety and Control Regulations - Class I Nuclear Facilities Regulations - Class II Nuclear Facilities and Prescribed Equipment Regulations - Nuclear Substances and Radiation Devices Regulations
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0119 Publication Date: 2008-04-30
AttachmentsAttachment
precis:
REGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE NUCLEAR SAFETY AND CONTROL ACT which provide for the incorporation of a number of international standards and would correct minor deficiencies or inconsistencies in the Regulations listed hereunder:

- General Nuclear Safety and Control Regulations
- Class I Nuclear Facilities Regulations
- Class II Nuclear Facilities and Prescribed Equipment Regulations
- Nuclear Substances and Radiation Devices Regulations
